definition: of, relating to, or being the sex that typically has the capacity to produce relatively small, usually motile gametes which fertilize the eggs of a female

having or producing only stamens or staminate flowers

having a gender identity that is the opposite of female

made up of usually adult members of the male sex : consisting of males

designed for or typically used by boys or men

masculine sense 3a

characteristic of boys or men

relating to men

not developing into fruits

a male preserve  (=only for men): Until recently, the sport has been a predominantly male preserve.

definition: used to refer to men or boys, or the sex that fertilizes eggs, and does not produce babies or eggs itself:
used to refer to a piece of equipment that has a part that sticks out and can be fitted into a hollow part in another piece of equipment:
a boy, man, or male animal:

belonging to or relating to men:
used to describe a piece of equipment that has a part that sticks out and fits into a hole or space in another part:
a man or boy:
